titleStmt.title: The abridgemente of goddes statutes in myter, set oute by Wylliam Samuel seruaunt to the Duke of Somerset hys grace
titleStmt.author: Samuel, William, fl. 1551-1569.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Crowley [i.e. R. Grafton] for Robert Soughton [i.e. Stoughton] dwellynge at the signe of ye bishops miter wythin Ludgate,

notesStmt.note: A verse abridgment of the Pentateuch.
Identified as STC 21960+ on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of a photostat of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: the signe of ye bishops miter wythin Ludgate
